configuration

Class BatchClusteringConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • configuration.BatchClusteringConfig

  • public class BatchClusteringConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a configuration class for batch clustering testing, which allows the batch tester to be invoked from other parts of the code, as well as allowing customizable file format for saving the configuration. In this case, it supports JSON I/O, which makes it easy to automatically generate clustering evaluation requests from external code.
